subject: Soccer
Coaches and Managers
Deaths (Obituaries)
World Cup (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: Mr. Bearzot’s tenure as coach of Italy’s national soccer team was the longest for a national team coach in a country where soccer coaches are second-guessed more than politicians.
snippet: Mr. Bearzot’s tenure as coach of Italy’s national soccer team was the longest for a national team coach in a country where soccer coaches are second-guessed more than politicians.
